dc:title: Fall Appeal - Oct/Nov 1971
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Tells of bare cupboards and comments on hunger in the world. Says the war in Laos and Cambodia is producing "a reflected violence at home." Quotes St. Augustine on giving what is superfluous to the poor and that giving be combined with respect for others.
